// Exercise 1: Generating BOTH solutions to the quadratic equation
float a
float b
float c
float x_plus
float x_minus
float dis
a = Get next input
b = Get next input
c = Get next input
dis = SquareRoot ((b * b)- (4 * a * c))
Put "dis: \n" to output
Put dis to output

x_plus = (b + dis)/(2*a)
x_minus = (b - dis)/(2*a)



Put "x_plus: \n" to output
Put x_plus to output
Put "\n" to output

Put "x_minus: \n" to output
Put x_minus to output


// 
Function Discriminant(float a, float b, float c) returns float dis_Out
   dis_Out = SquareRoot ((b * b)- (4 * a * c))

Function QuadSolver(float a, float b, float c) returns float array(2) solsOut
   float dis
   dis = Discriminant(a,b,c)
   solsOut[0] = (-b + dis)/(2*a)
   solsOut[1] = (-b - dis)/(2*a)

Function Main() returns nothing
   float a
   float b
   float c
   float array(2) answer
   a = Get next input
   b = Get next input
   c = Get next input
   answer = QuadSolver(a,b,c)
   Put answer[0] to output
   Put "\n" to output
   Put answer[1] to output
